languages.text: Лорд-капитан с{mf|чел|очла}, что следовать видениям псайкера небезопасно. Идире Тласс было отказано в выполнении ее просьбы.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан с{mf|чел|очла}, что следовать видениях псайкера небезопасно. Идире Тласс было отказано в выполнении ее просьбы.

languages.text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан с{mf|чел|очла}, что следовать видениям псайкера небезопасно. Идире Тласс было отказано в выполнении ее просьбы.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.
The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.
The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.
The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé qu'il serait trop imprudent de suivre les visions d'une psyker. La demande d'Idira Tlass a été refusée.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé qu'il serait trop imprudent de suivre les visions d'une psyker. La demande d'Idira Tlass a été refusée.

languages.text: 行商浪人认为跟随灵能者的幻象前进属于鲁莽之举，于是拒绝了伊迪拉·特拉斯的请求。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人认为跟随灵能者的幻象前进属于鲁莽之举，于是拒绝了伊迪拉·特拉斯的请求。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、異能者のビジョンに従うのは無謀だと判断した。イディラ・タラースの願いは聞き届けられなかった。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、異能者のビジョンに従うのは無謀だと判断した。イディラ・タラースの願いは聞き届けられなかった。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat entschieden, dass ein törichtes Unterfangen ist, den Visionen einer Psionikerin zu folgen. Idira Tlass' Bitte wurde abgelehnt.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat entschieden, dass ein törichtes Unterfangen ist, den Visionen einer Psionikerin zu folgen. Idira Tlass' Bitte wurde abgelehnt.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido que seguir las visiones de una psíquica es una insensatez. La petición de Idira Tlass queda denegada.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido que seguir las visiones de una psíquica es una insensatez. La petición de Idira Tlass queda denegada.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, bir ruhsezerin görülerini takip etmenin pervasız bir çaba olduğuna karar verdi. İdira Tlass'ın talebi reddedildi.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain decided that following a psyker's visions was a foolhardy endeavour. Idira Tlass's request was refused.
